item.title: Amherst Coursework
item.description: Amherst Coursework is a web application that provides Amherst College students and faculty with an intuitive, advanced interface for course search.

item.title: MatPlus
item.description: MatPlus is a Python package that provides easy, convenient plotting capabilities built on top of matplotlib. It simplifies the creation of common visualization types with intuitive APIs.

item.title: Resumax
item.description: Resumax is a personalized AI resume reviewer built with Llama 3.2 for the Loeb Career Center at Amherst College.

item.title: Amherst Connect
item.description: Access Amherst is a web application created to connect Amherst College students through organized, accessible, and diverse event updates on campus. The platform provides real-time information on campus events, allowing students to plan their schedules effectively.

item.title: SEC Sleuth
item.description: SEC Sleuth is a web interface designed to efficiently retrieve and present data from SEC filings, specifically the 10-Q and 10-K forms available through the EDGAR database. The application leverages a RAG fine-tuned on Microsoft Phi-3.5 Mini to provide accurate and contextually relevant information from these financial documents.

item.title: Vendor Map
item.description: Vendor Map is a web application that streams live NYC foot traffic data and applies game theory principles to optimally allocate food vendors across the city. Vendor Map won 2nd prize at the 2024 Cubist Hackathon.
